channel.title: Help with command

item.title: Help with command
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

Starting making a server again after a long stop.
Everytime I use this command I relogin and it didn’t work.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“membership”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String victem = command.substring(7);
sendMessage(“Player “+victem+” successfully got membership settings”);

client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victem)];
c.playerIsMember = 1;
}[/code]

What’s wrong? :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 08:59:47 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 09:01:45 AM[/size][hr]Help?

Read full topic
